modName: Divine Punishment for Mention of Arrows in the Knee
summary:
The gods have grown tired of hearing guards retell their one-line life story to any passing adventurer!
Henceforth, any man who dares to mention an arrow and a knee in the same sentence shall be struck down with divine lightning!
descriptionHtml:
Are you tired of hearing guards tell you their life story? Are you tired of feigning sympathy?
Are you tired of BLOWING THEM TO SMITHEREENS because you don't care (and then getting arrested)?

Well NO LONGER!

The divines have grown tired too!
Henceforth, any man who dares to mention an arrow and a knee in the same sentence shall be immediately struck down with lightning!

(Also available on the Steam Workshop: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1174244]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1174244[/url])

And, by popular demand, Sheogorath and Alduin now have gripes of their own!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28001]Daedric Punishment for Insults Related to Sweetrolls
[/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/69069]Dragon Punishment for Cloud District Quips[/url]
These mods are all compatible.

A Russian translation thanks to Echo is available at tesworld.ru:
[url=http://tes-world.ru/load/plaginy_dlja_skyrim/prochee/bozhja_kara_za_strelu_v_kolene/61-1-0-1017]http://tes-world.ru/load/plaginy_dlja_skyrim/prochee/bozhja_kara_za_strelu_v_kolene/61-1-0-1017[/url]
A Polish translation thanks to MrQubo is available here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45299]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45299[/url]

Also check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9385]Stones of Barenziah Quest Markers[/url]
